children: {{content.materials.text || 'We traverse the globe, not as tourists, but as pilgrims seeking the finest natural fibers. From the softest Andean wool to the most vibrant Indian silks, our materials are sourced with an unwavering commitment to ethical practices and sustainable futures. We believe the soul of the material is the foundation of the art.'}}

children: {{content.process.text || 'Patience is our most-used tool. The dye pots simmer, the shuttles fly, and patterns emerge slowly, deliberately. There are no shortcuts in the pursuit of beauty. It's a slow, meditative dance between artisan and material.'}}
